S.FORM: Tayal qalang hogal squnun kuwara squliq na tayal Taywan ga kbhul hi ga sazing pasento balay. kya hmzinas smka na' qu cyux maki qalang rgyax, kya obeh smka squliq tayal cyux mshzi maki qalang hogal la. cingay qu pcyuwagan qalang hogal hya, smrawiy hmuluy khmay mrkyas. kruma ga cyux si trhuw maki qalang hogal, mtzyuwaw, magal bes, ru qmayat kinbahan. nanu yasa qu cingay balay kinbahan tayal cyux mrkyas mqyanux qalang hogal la.
